BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Economic Development and the Committee on Small Business

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Coordination of New York City's Workforce Development Efforts and its Impact on Unemployment.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the Coordination of New York City's Workforce Development Efforts and its Impact on Unemployment.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Economic Development and the Committee on Small Business

A Local Law to amend the New York city charter in relation to establishing a Mayor's Office of Skills and Education and the repeal of paragraphs a and c of subdivision 5 of Section 1301 of the New York city charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing a Mayor's Office of Skills and Education and the repeal of paragraphs a and c of subdivision 5 of Section 1301 of the New York city charter.

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Coordination of New York City's Workforce Development Efforts and its Impact on Unemployment.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the Coordination of New York City's Workforce Development Efforts and its Impact on Unemployment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter in relation to establishing a Mayor's Office of Skills and Education and the repeal of paragraphs a and c of subdivision 5 of Section 1301 of the New York city charter.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing a Mayor's Office of Skills and Education and the repeal of paragraphs a and c of subdivision 5 of Section 1301 of the New York city charter.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Lander, Reyna, Weprin, Lappin, Eugene, Koo, Rodriguez, Ferreras, Chin and White.
